channel.title: Making a item
channel.description:
How would I make a item that turns you into a npc when you wield it? For example I can make a ring turn myself into sAnta clause! :p
Also how would I make a shop that only donators can open?

item.title: Making a item
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Well this is how I added it in my

ClickingButtons.java

case 23132: //unmorph c.setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); c.setSidebarInterface(2, 638); c.setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); c.setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); c.setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); c.setSidebarInterface(7, 1); c.setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); c.setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); c.setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); c.setSidebarInterface(11, 904); c.setSidebarInterface(12, 147); c.setSidebarInterface(13, 962); c.setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerAmulet] == 295) { c.getItems().deleteEquipment(c.playerEquipment[c.playerAmulet], c.playerAmulet); c.getItems().addItem(295,1); } c.npcId2 = -1; c.isNpc = false; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

[quote=“Kozs, post:24, topic:412629”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=514108.msg3734973#msg3734973 date=1314890381]
If it doesn’t work, make sure it has something like

c.npcId2 = -1;
c.isNpc = false;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

[/quote]

Ight, lemme try this my man.[/quote]

You just sounded like my dad. Are you from Dorset by any chance, lol?

item.title: Making a item
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

^ It’s got c., it wouldn’t be referencing to the Client class if it was in the Client class. Something for you to look out for in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a item
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“I hate fails, post:19, topic:412629”]if(c.wearId == ####) {
c.sendMessage("@red@do ::return to turn back to normal!");
c.sendMessage(“you transformed!”);
c.npcId2 = ####;
c.isNpc = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
Enjoy.[/quote]

Client.java?

Read full topic

item.title: Making a item
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Check for the packet/file that makes you do actions when clicking an item, like drinking or eating, and just made a case/statement to turn you in to a pnpc instead of deleting a food item and adding HP… basically.

Can’t tell you exactly, neither should I.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a item
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:10, topic:412629”][quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514108.msg3731364#msg3731364 date=1314652661]

Guys, you are not helping him. First of all how can you attempt to post on this when you dont even know his source base? come on guys use a little common sense. Now what source base do you have?

EDIT This is meant for the people who posted about the Item That turns you into a NPC

sigh… What other base do people use? Nobody uses anything except PI, if they did they would post it.
[/quote]First of all do not assume everybody uses PI, I know alot of people who run a 562, And alot of people who run allstar and even a couple who run a successful Delta, so therfor Not everyone plays PI, Just cause you dont add what source your using doesnt mean its PI… so yea

[quote]Insert Quote

All you do is take the pnpc code and put it where you need to.[/quote]
That was actually no help to him, therfor you need to give him a code… Not just Say that. Lol.

Every Source here is PI. I’m not gonna spoonfeed the shit out of him,[/quote] No not every source here is PI, im tired of people thinking that’s all everyone uses, thats inccorrect information because it is not. End of discussion

Read full topic
